name: Six.Shooter
description:
Six.Shooter is an entry for Lospec Jam 1 by Tom Guycott and Sevenstitch.

Fight your way through a group of bandits to defeat their mysterious leader, armed only with your trusty Six Shooter. Ammunition is unlimited, but it can only be loaded six shots at a time, so pay attention to your bullets!

Controls:

Hold Z: Reload

X: Shoot

Enter: Doesn't pause

Credits:

Visual effects by Sevenstitch

Programming by Tom Guycott

Music from Vice: Project Doom on the NES

A bug was brought to my attention after uploading where the boss did not die as intended! Unfortunately, it won't be able to be uploaded with an updated version until after the Game Jam is completed. Sorry for the inconvenience!
